channel.title: Compile & Run
channel.description:
Right, My Laptop Got Fucked, So Had To Rebuild The Fucker. Got JDK 6 Updated 6. I Want To Compile And Run:
Compile Issue:
So I Try To Compile; And I Get This: [code]You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .[/code] This Is In Compile: [code]@echo off color 0a title War-Ages Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit[/code]
Any Help Would Be Greatfull
Run Issue:
So I Want To Run; I Get This: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] This Is In Run: [code]@echo off title Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6_6\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
Any Help Would Be Greatfull.
Thanks; Raffo.

item.title: Compile & Run
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

Right, My Laptop Got Fucked, So Had To Rebuild The Fucker.
Got JDK 6 Updated 6.
I Want To Compile And Run:

Compile Issue:

So I Try To Compile;
And I Get This:

You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .
This Is In Compile:

@echo off color 0a title War-Ages Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

Any Help Would Be Greatfull

Run Issue:

So I Want To Run;
I Get This:

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
This Is In Run:

@echo off title Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6_6\bin\java.exe" server pause

Any Help Would Be Greatfull.

Thanks;
Raffo.

Read full topic
